Acolyte: A holy symbol (a gift when you entered priesthood), a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments (religious clothing), common clothes, a pouch containing 15gp
Charlatan: Chosen con, fine clothes, a disguise kit, a pouch containing 15gp
Criminal: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, a pouch containing 15gp
Entertainer: Chosen instrument, chosen favor of an admirer, a costume, and a pouch containing 15gp
Folk Hero: Chosen artisan's tools, a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10gp
Guild Artisan: Chosen artisan's tools, a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 15gp
Noble: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, a purse containing 25gp
Outlander: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler's clothes, a pouch containing 10gp
Sage: A bottle of ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, a pouch containing 10gp
Soldier: Chosen trophy, chosen game tools, an insignia of rank, a set of common clothes, a pouch containing 10gp
Urchin: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of common clothes, a pouch containing 10gp
